definitions.example: One of the wagon wheels came off.

definitions.definition: To have some success; to succeed.
definitions.example: He tried his Chaplin impression, but it didn't really come off.

definitions.definition: To appear; to seem; to project a certain quality.
definitions.example: I'm sorry if I came off as condescending; that wasn't my intention.

definitions.definition: To escape or get off (lightly, etc.); to come out of a situation without significant harm.
To come away (from a place); to leave.
